subject: Re: Remote pairing
msgSnippet: David, I have been using several solutions, none the best in all cases. VNC is usually too slow for me. Windows: http://www.logmein.com Hamachi with conf.exe
messageBody:
David,

I have been using several solutions, none the best in all cases. VNC
is usually too slow for me.

Windows:

http://www.logmein.com
Hamachi with conf.exe (NetMeeting)
Screen sharing in Skype 3.0

Linux:
NxServer

David Vydra
www.testdriven.com


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <saff@...> wrote:
>
> All,
>
> A good chunk of the development work among committers on the JUnit
> project these days is done by pair-programming remotely. The problem
> is that most of the solutions we've come across (VNC, Citrix,
> Microsoft) are either too sluggish to present the ideal illusion that
> we are sharing the same instance of Eclipse, or don't play well with
> the firewalls on our personal networks. Has anyone tried a remote
> pair-programming solution that they were 100% happy with? Thanks,
>
> David Saff
>
